channel.title: Comments on: The Upside-Down House (and Message)
channel.description: Amit Schreiber's Blog | הבלוג של עמית שרייבר

item.title: By: Amit
item.dc:creator: Amit
item.description:
I haven't noticed the sandtrooper, actually. It is an attraction :)
I've seen pictures of other houses like this one before, but no one that made people disoriented to the point of being sick.
item.content:encoded:
I haven’t noticed the sandtrooper, actually. It is an attraction :)

I’ve seen pictures of other houses like this one before, but no one that made people disoriented to the point of being sick.

item.title: By: Ariel Cohen
item.dc:creator: Ariel Cohen
item.description: Have you noticed the sandtrooper in the second image? By himself he should be a popular attraction. Anyway, I tried to look for better photos and found that there are several such houses around the globe.
item.content:encoded: Have you noticed the sandtrooper in the second image? By himself he should be a popular attraction. Anyway, I tried to look for better photos and found that there are several such houses around the globe.
